install.name: DC MoneyBookers.com Module
install.author: DART Creations
install.description: Thank you for installing DC MoneyBookers Module. This module is a customizable module to enable MoneyBookers.com Payments on your Joomla 1.5 website. The following features are available: - Allows you to use whether to display a MoneyBookers Image or your own text - Customizable MoneyBookers email of Organization to send money to - Customizable MoneyBookers email to send notifications to - Selectable Currency for Payment - Payment value - Choice of text for Submit button e.g. Donate, Buy Now etc. - CSS aware for customizable style of module Visit http://www.dart-creations.com for details.

param.name: logo_on
param.label: Logo or Text?
param.description: Do you want visitors to view a logo/image in the module?.

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo URL or Text
param.description: URL of the logo you want viewed or HTML of some text.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: moneyb_text
param.label: Text Description
param.description: Text Description of product / services being sold

param.name: moneybval_button
param.label: Button Text
param.description: Text to put on your button.

param.name: link
param.label: Invisible Link to Author
param.description: Invisible Link to author of the module
